title: Charles Darwin
brief_description: “Summary: presents the discoveries, method of study, theories and personal philosophy of charles darwin. describes his observations on the galapagos finches which later figured in his conclusions on organic evolution. features professor richard eakin of the university of california in the role of the scientist”
